name: The horse Game
description:
!!!!!!!!!READ ME!!!!!!!! Hey, here are some instructions: The goal is simple: Don't let the crystal touch the horses. The E is your cursor, whenever you hit the crystal it makes a 180 turn, although sometimes you might keep hitting it and get it caught inside you. If that happens, just move out of the way quickly, it'll come off of you. Also, to start the game you need to click the flag and then press your spacebar. You may need to hit it twice, but it'll eventually go. To reset, you need to refresh the page and do the spacebar thing again. I promise this game works. x) If you wanna learn some story, continue reading. If you don't, well, have fun! Oh noo! You lost your prized Crystal in the center of some horses! You must keep it away from the horses! Everyone knows a horse's favorite snack is a Crystal, and tHey will stop at nothing to eat your Crystal! That's so mean! You got your Crystal fair and squarE, they should have to find their own crystals! Well, we tried all we could, but your Crystal stiLl managed to fall into the horse circle. As the mighty e, you will journey into the horse circle hoping to escaPe with your Crystal! HonEstly, I'm cheering for you to win. I can't stanD when horses try to eat innocent crystals. Now, go on your quest, save your Crystal, and take down the evil, weirD, crazy horses!! 

H-Hello?

Can you see my text?

I think you can. So this is how they do it... Whatever, do me a favor and don't play this game. It's a trap set up by the horses so they can capture people. I can't get into the details right now, I don't have much time, but my name is Edd. Just please don't play this game. Trust me. Save us. Don't let us be captured like so many others have. We're real people, just like you. We had lives. These horses took them. If you wanna prevent any more lives being taken, don't play. 

Don't listen to him! You need to play the game and save your Crystal! It's the only way!!
